QuestData.Title: Close Enough to Touch
QuestData.Description: He is near, $n, I can feel it.$b$bWe must scour this place in search of my husband. I fear if we do not find him soon it will be too late.$b$bYou have been courageous throughout our search. I know you will not fail me now, $n.$b$bThank you, and please hurry.

Objectives.Objective: Search for Malfurion at the Inn
Search for Malfurion near the Lake
Search for Malfurion in the Village
